featured.text: After working in front of my computer for the entire day, my neck and shoulders got so that I couldn’t even turn my head.
They may fill out an agreement spelling out who shoulders which responsibilities if a problem arises.

definition.zh_def: 肩膀，人體上連接手臂和身體的部位。
definition.en_def: The part of the body where the arm connects to the torso.
definition.example: She carried the heavy bag on her shoulder.
